entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -15.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -15.2°C

Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 38 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -26.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 12.
